00220 // protected methods
00221 
00222 inline i2d::CVector2d CPerspectiveCalibration::GetNormPosition(const i2d::CVector2d& viewPosition) const
00223 {
00224        return i2d::CVector2d(
00225                                    (viewPosition.GetX() - m_viewCenter.GetX()) * m_pixelAngleTangents.GetX(),
00226                                    (viewPosition.GetY() - m_viewCenter.GetY()) * m_pixelAngleTangents.GetY());
00227 }
00228 
00229 
00230 inline i2d::CVector2d CPerspectiveCalibration::GetViewPosition(const i2d::CVector2d& normPosition) const
00231 {
00232        return i2d::CVector2d(
00233                                    normPosition.GetX() / m_pixelAngleTangents.GetX() + m_viewCenter.GetX(),
00234                                    normPosition.GetY() / m_pixelAngleTangents.GetY() + m_viewCenter.GetY());
00235 }
